title: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: When entering an XPath expression for the column mapping in the XML Edit Data Set dialog with a selection part like section[@id='left'], the selection is stripped off and stored in the filterInfo HashMap. However, when leaving the dialog, the RelationInformation is persisted to .rptdesign but the data stored in filterInfo is lost. In my opinion, treating XPath expressions in this way will lead to a lot of trouble.
OB: When leaving the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the data stored in the filterInfo HashMap is lost.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist the data stored in the filterInfo HashMap when clicked on OK or Apply.
SR:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog
2. Enter an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selection part like section[@id='left']
3. Add any other required information
4. Click on OK or Apply
5. Close the dialog
6. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog
7. Verify that the information in the filterInfo HashMap is still present
